name: GDDL Integration
description: Integration with Geometry Dash Demon Ladder - level tiers, search and more

issues.info: You can submit a <cr>bug report</cr>/<cj>feature request</cj> directly to the mod's repo here

login.name: GDDL Account
login.description: <cb>Log in</cb> to your <cr>GDDL Account</cr> to be able to submit ratings <cg>directly from the game</cg>.

button-position.name: Button position
button-position.description: Defines the <cr>GDDL Button</cr> position on the <cb>level info</cb> page. <cy>By default</cy> it's positioned <cp>to the left</cp> of the <cr>demon difficulty face</cr>. This setting <cy>is overridden</cy> by the setting "<cb>Use old tier label</cb>"

use-old-tier-label.name: Use old tier label
use-old-tier-label.description: <cy>Changes</cy> the <cr>tier button</cr> on the <cb>level info page</cb> into a <cg>clickable label</cg>, just like it used to be in the <co>early versions of this mod</co>. Allows you to <cy>specify an offset</cy> to move the label <cg>up</cg> <cb>or</cb> <cr>down</cr> by the given number of rows. <cr>This setting overrides "Button position"!</cr>

use-old-info-popup.name: Use old level info popup
use-old-info-popup.description: When activated, will show the <cb>simple popup</cb> with average <cr>tier</cr> and <cg>enjoyment</cg> ratings instead of the one introduced in 1.2 with <cy>bar charts and skillsets</cy>

thin-chart-bars.name: Spacing in spread charts
thin-chart-bars.description: Makes the bars in <cr>rating</cr> and <cg>enjoyment</cg> spread charts thinner; when deactivated will leave <cb>no spacing between</cb> bars in the charts

exclude-range.name: Include/Exclude range
exclude-range.description: <cr>Removes</cr> the GDDL button from level pages of levels <cy>within</cy> the specified range. If the <cb>include</cb> toggle is toggled <cg>on</cg>, the ratings will <cy>only</cy> be displayed in the specified range. If both range ends are set to <cb>0</cb>, this setting does <cy>nothing</cy>; an empty value means 1 (range beginning) and 35 (range end) by default. Range is <cg>inclusive</cg> on <cb>both</cb> ends.

popup-color.name: GDDL Popups color
popup-color.description: <cy>Changes</cy> the <cb>background color</cb> of the gray backgrounds in <cr>this mod's</cr> popups

cache-reset-v3.name: Reset GDDL cache
cache-reset-v3.description: Use if the <cr>GDDL Split layer</cr> shows <cy>zero</cy> for every tier or if the ratings on the level info page are <co>inaccurate</co>.
